SegmentCodeDescriptionSOIFF D8Start of ImageJFIF-APP0FF E0 s1 s2 4A 46 49 46 00 …JFXX-APP0FF E0 s1 s2 4A 46 58 58 00 …additional marker segmentsSOSFF DAStart of Scancompressed image dataEOIFF D9End of Image

The JFIF Standard defines the following segments:

description: JFIF (JPEG File Interchange Format (JFIF)) is an image format file that uses the .jfif extension. JFIF builds over JIF (JPEG Interchange Format) by reducing complexity and solving its limitations.
